description:
My place is close to the 2/3 train, which is express and will take you to Times Square in 20min. 
My place is a big studio with lots of natural light. The living area and the bed are separated by a bookcase. It is very clean. Safe doorman Building with Elevator. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers and families (with kids). There is plenty to do in the area, it is close to Red Rooster, Sylvia's, Corner Social, some amazing Gospels ...
name: Beautiful big studio
review: I liked the apartment very much. Very comfortable for the space. The location outside the crowds of the city at this season (Christmas) is perfect. Easy access to transport. The neighborhood is very quiet. Close to supermarket. I would stay in a future occasion.
